title: ***** TEST DRIVE VEGAS before you COMMIT.... FURNISHED MO-2-MO HOUSING
posting_body: Why Rush when you can window shop for a while?
Finding the right place takes time and our flexible leasing platform allows you to find a temporary furnished short-term rental with ease!
*for security reasons, we do not communicate through Craigslist.
For inquiries, please connect with us through our website, <URL>, either by the phone number listed or through our contact-us page.
Craigslist is full fake listings, please be careful.
